```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
```


```{r}
grouped <- read_csv("C:/Users/Bryant Willoughby/Documents/DRUMS/raw(Windy)/Final data sets/prefire_windy_grouped_finaldata.csv")
```

```{r}
grouped <- grouped %>%
  select(LC, everything())

head(grouped)
```

```{r}
# Columns to exclude from standardization
columns_to_exclude <- c("LC", "Lat", "Lon", "dnbr", "dnbr6")

# Standardize all columns except the ones to exclude
columns_to_standardize <- setdiff(names(grouped), columns_to_exclude)
grouped[columns_to_standardize] <- scale(grouped[columns_to_standardize])

head(grouped)
```

```{r}
write.csv(grouped, "C:/Users/Bryant Willoughby/Documents/DRUMS/raw(Windy)/Final data sets/prefire_windy_grouped_standard_finaldata.csv", row.names = F)

```
